forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 57F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
